name: Fado
location: Legendary Pictograph - Captured during a waxing crescent moon. Obtainable at the Nintendo Gallery once the picture has been taken.

name: Makar
location: Found in Forest Haven (outside the Great Deku Tree's chamber) or later in the Wind Temple. Best taken before entering the Wind Temple.

name: Great Deku Tree
location: Forest Haven (inside his chamber).

name: Hollo
location: Forest Haven (inside the Potion Shop).

name: Elma
location: Forest Haven (standing near the waterfall) or at Needle Rock Isle (after delivering letter).

name: Olivio
location: Forest Haven (standing on a ledge near the entrance) or at Eastern Fairy Island (after delivering letter).

name: Aldo
location: Forest Haven (on a platform near the Great Deku Tree's chamber) or at Cliff Plateau Isles (after delivering letter).

name: Oakin
location: Forest Haven (on a higher platform near the entrance) or at Star Island (after delivering letter).

name: Drona
location: Forest Haven (on a leaf platform) or at Private Oasis (after delivering letter).

name: Irch
location: Forest Haven (near the water's edge) or at Shark Island (after delivering letter).

name: Rown
location: Forest Haven (on a lower platform) or at Mother and Child Isles (after delivering letter).

name: Linder
location: Forest Haven (on a small island) or at Greatfish Isle (after delivering letter).

name: Carlov
location: Nintendo Gallery (standing behind the counter).

name: Manny
location: Initially found on top of the northern small island in Forest Haven, then moves inside the Nintendo Gallery itself. Take a pictograph of him outside before he moves into the gallery.

name: Medli
location: Dragon Roost Island (inside the Rito's room) or at the Earth Temple (as your partner). Best taken before entering Earth Temple.

name: Valoo
location: After saving Medli from Dragon Roost Cavern, take a pictograph of Valoo from a distance while he rests on the mountain top of Dragon Roost Island.

name: Komali
location: Dragon Roost Island (initially in the Chieftain's room, later found outside on the island).

name: Kogoli
location: Dragon Roost Island (on the outside deck, before clearing Dragon Roost Cavern). **Missable!** He disappears after the dungeon.

name: Quill
location: Bundled with the Rito Chieftain figurine. Not a separate pictograph.

name: Koboli
location: Dragon Roost Island (working at the mail sorting desk).

name: Laruto
location: Legendary Pictograph - Captured during the first quarter moon. Obtainable at the Nintendo Gallery once the picture has been taken.

name: Pashli
location: Dragon Roost Island (working at the mail sorting desk).

name: Baito
location: Dragon Roost Island (working at the mail sorting desk).

name: Skett & Akoot
location: Dragon Roost Island (standing guard near the bridge leading to the Chieftain's room).

name: Basht & Bisht
location: Dragon Roost Island (standing guard near the main entrance).

name: Hoskit
location: Dragon Roost Island (guarding the entrance to the Chieftain's room).

name: Ilari
location: Dragon Roost Island (on the upper level, near the launch platform).

name: Namali
location: Dragon Roost Island (working at the mail sorting desk).

name: Rito Chieftain
location: Dragon Roost Island (inside his room).

name: Zephos & Cyclos
location: Zephos is found on Dragon Roost Island. Cyclos appears in tornadoes on the Great Sea; take his pictograph before shooting him down with your bow to learn the Ballad of Gales. **Missable!** Cyclos disappears after you learn the song.

name: Obli
location: Flight Control Platform (standing on the platform).

name: Willi
location: Flight Control Platform (inside the building).

name: ChuChu
location: Various Dungeons and Caves (e.g., Dragon Roost Cavern, Forsaken Fortress, Wind Temple).

name: Bokoblin
location: Various Dungeons, Islands, and Sea Platforms (e.g., Forsaken Fortress, Dragon Roost Cavern, Pawprint Isle).

name: Floor Master
location: Tower of the Gods, Earth Temple, Wind Temple.

name: Gyorg
location: Great Sea (a large, shark-like enemy found swimming in specific sectors).

name: Kargaroc
location: Dragon Roost Island (flying around the peak) or various other islands and sea platforms.

name: Keese & Fire Keese
location: Various Caves and Dungeons (e.g., Dragon Roost Cavern, Fire Mountain, Earth Temple).

name: Magtail
location: Dragon Roost Cavern (crawling on walls) or Fire Mountain (inside the cave).

name: Miniblin
location: Forsaken Fortress (early in the game) or various caves (e.g., Savage Labyrinth).

name: Morth
location: Forbidden Woods (attached to enemies or objects) or Forest Haven (floating in water).

name: Octorok
location: Great Sea (shooting rocks from the water) or Forest Haven (in the water).

name: Peahat
location: Various Islands (floating in the air, e.g., Southern Fairy Island) or Dungeons (e.g., Forbidden Woods).

name: Poe
location: Earth Temple (ghostly enemies) or the Ghost Ship (found inside).

name: Rat
location: Forsaken Fortress (in various rooms) or Windfall Island (in the jail cell) or various caves.

name: Red Bubble and Blue Bubble
location: Various Dungeons (e.g., Dragon Roost Cavern, Earth Temple, Wind Temple, Tower of the Gods, Ganon's Tower).

name: ReDead
location: Earth Temple (found in several rooms) or various caves (e.g., Savage Labyrinth).

name: Seahat
location: Great Sea (small flying enemies, often near watchtowers).

name: Armos
location: Tower of the Gods (statues that come to life) or Wind Temple (activated statues).

name: Armos Knight
location: Tower of the Gods (mini-boss) or Ganon's Tower (found in later rooms).

name: Boko Baba
location: Forest Haven (man-eating plants) or Forbidden Woods (as enemies).

name: Ganondorf
location: Ganon's Tower (final boss fight). Also available as a Legendary Pictograph - Captured during a full moon. Obtainable at the Nintendo Gallery once the picture has been taken.

name: Phantom Ganon
location: Forsaken Fortress (mini-boss) or Ganon's Tower (appears in multiple rooms). **Missable!** Ensure you get his pictograph at Forsaken Fortress.

name: Helmaroc King
location: Forsaken Fortress (boss fight). **Missable!** Must be captured during the boss battle.

name: Mighty Darknut
location: Hyrule Castle (found before it's flooded) or Ganon's Tower (caped version, later in the game).

name: Big Octo
location: Great Sea (appears in specific 4x4 sectors when disturbed by your boat). **Missable!** There are a limited number of them.

name: Gohma
location: Dragon Roost Cavern (boss fight) or Ganon's Tower (re-fight).

name: Kalle Demos
location: Forbidden Woods (boss fight) or Ganon's Tower (re-fight).

name: Gohdan
location: Tower of the Gods (boss fight) or Ganon's Tower (re-fight).

name: Jalhalla
location: Earth Temple (boss fight) or Ganon's Tower (re-fight).

name: Molgera
location: Wind Temple (boss fight) or Ganon's Tower (re-fight).

name: Puppet Ganon
location: Ganon's Tower (part of the final boss sequence). **Missable!** Must be captured during the fight.

name: Mothula
location: Forbidden Woods (mini-boss) or Forest Haven (found in a grotto) or Wind Temple.

name: Darknut
location: Tower of the Gods, Earth Temple, Hyrule Castle, Ganon's Tower (regular armored version).

name: Darknut (with Shield)
location: Tower of the Gods, Hyrule Castle, Ganon's Tower (the version with a shield, sometimes golden).

name: Red Wizzrobe
location: Wind Temple (mini-boss in a specific room). **Missable!** Only appears once as a mini-boss.

name: Stalfos
location: Earth Temple (skeletal enemies) or Ganon's Tower.

name: Wizzrobe
location: Tower of the Gods, Wind Temple, Ganon's Tower (magic-wielding enemies).

name: Moblin
location: Forsaken Fortress (early in the game) or various caves and islands (e.g., Needle Rock Isle).

name: Aryll
location: Bundled with the Grandma figurine. Not a separate pictograph.

name: Grandma
location: Outset Island (inside Link's house).

name: Orca
location: Outset Island (inside his house, 1st floor).

name: Sturgeon
location: Outset Island (inside his house, 2nd floor, above Orca).

name: Sue-Belle
location: Outset Island (carrying water jugs, either outside or inside her house).

name: Mesa
location: Outset Island (usually found near the general store or his house).

name: Abe
location: Outset Island (often near the pigs or his house).

name: Rose
location: Outset Island (often near the pigs or her house).

name: Joel
location: Outset Island (one of the kids, often playing outside).

name: Zill
location: Outset Island (one of the kids, often playing outside).

name: Jabun
location: Legendary Pictograph - Captured during a last quarter moon. Obtainable at the Nintendo Gallery once the picture has been taken.

name: Crab
location: Outset Island (on the beach) or various other beaches and coastal areas.

name: Seagull
location: Various locations across the Great Sea (flying in the air).

name: Pig
location: Outset Island (wandering around) or Windfall Island (specific locations for side quests).

name: Tott
location: Windfall Island (singing on the pier, near the mailbox).

name: Candy
location: Windfall Island (often found behind the auction house or near the town entrance).

name: Mila
location: Windfall Island (initially inside the shop, later found outside near the tree).

name: Maggie
location: Windfall Island (initially inside her house, later found outside near the town entrance).

name: Maggie's Father
location: Windfall Island (inside their house).

name: Killer Bees
location: Windfall Island (the group of children, often found playing outside the school).

name: Zunari
location: Windfall Island (at his shop stall in the town square).

name: Lenzo
location: Windfall Island (inside the Pictograph Shop).

name: Anton
location: Windfall Island (walking around the town square, often looking at Mila).

name: Linda
location: Windfall Island (often found near the Chu Jelly Juice Shop).

name: Kamo
location: Windfall Island (standing near the Bomb Shop or the Ferris wheel).

name: Potova & Joanna
location: Windfall Island (Potova is inside the school, Joanna is often on the beach).

name: Minenco
location: Windfall Island (often found near the Potion Shop or the Auction House).

name: Pompie & Vera
location: Windfall Island (often found gossiping near Zunari's shop).

name: Miss Marie
location: Windfall Island (inside the school).

name: Garrickson
location: Windfall Island (walking around outside, often near the Cafe Bar).

name: Gossack
location: Windfall Island (inside the Cafe Bar, looking glum).

name: Cannon
location: Windfall Island (inside the Bomb Shop).

name: Mila's Father
location: Windfall Island (inside his shop or occasionally near the tree).

name: Sam
location: Windfall Island (near the Auction House, sitting on a bench).

name: Kreeb
location: Windfall Island (walking around near the shops, often complaining).

name: Missy
location: Windfall Island (sitting on a bench near the town gate, next to Joel).

name: Dampa
location: Windfall Island (by the entrance of the Potion Shop).

name: Gummy
location: Windfall Island (outside the jail, under the archway).

name: Kane
location: Windfall Island (near the Bomb Shop, under the Ferris wheel).

name: Gillian
location: Windfall Island (inside the Cafe Bar, serving drinks).

name: Doc Bandam
location: Windfall Island (inside the Potion Shop).

name: Tetra
location: Pirate Ship (before entering Hyrule Castle). **Missable!** Her appearance changes later in the game.

name: Tingle
location: Tingle Island (on his island) or Windfall Island (initially in the jail cell).

name: Ankle
location: Tingle Island (one of Tingle's brothers).

name: David Jr.
location: Tingle Island (one of Tingle's brothers).

name: Salvatore
location: Windfall Island (running the Sploosh Kaboom game) or Spectacle Island (after winning a prize, during the game).

name: Fishman
location: Great Sea (appears in any sector when you sail into it for the first time).

name: Old Man Ho Ho
location: Found on various islands across the Great Sea, always looking through his telescope. Take a pictograph of him on any island he appears on.

name: Fairy Queen
location: Legendary Pictograph - Captured during a waning crescent moon. Obtainable at the Nintendo Gallery once the picture has been taken.

name: Great Fairy
location: Inside various Fairy Fountains across the Great Sea. Also available as a Legendary Pictograph - Captured during a waning gibbous moon. Obtainable at the Nintendo Gallery once the picture has been taken.

name: Beedle
location: On his shop ship, found sailing in various locations around the Great Sea (he follows your position).

name: Wandering Merchant
location: Various locations like Mother & Child Isles, Bomb Island, and Greatfish Isle (this is the Goron merchant).

name: King of Hyrule
location: Hyrule Castle (before it's flooded). Also available as a Legendary Pictograph - Captured during a waxing gibbous moon. Obtainable at the Nintendo Gallery once the picture has been taken.

name: Princess Zelda
location: Bundled with the King of Hyrule figurine. Not a separate pictograph.

name: Salvage Corp
location: Great Sea (on their boat, usually found near islands with sunken treasures).

name: Gonzo
location: Pirate Ship (one of Tetra's crew members). **Missable!** Only available before entering Hyrule Castle.

name: Mako
location: Pirate Ship (one of Tetra's crew members). **Missable!** Only available before entering Hyrule Castle.

name: Niko
location: Pirate Ship (one of Tetra's crew members) or Outset Island (after the pirate ship departs). **Missable!** Can become unavailable later.

name: Nudge
location: Pirate Ship (one of Tetra's crew members). **Missable!** Only available before entering Hyrule Castle.

name: Senza
location: Pirate Ship (one of Tetra's crew members). **Missable!** Only available before entering Hyrule Castle.

name: Zuko
location: Pirate Ship (one of Tetra's crew members). **Missable!** Only available before entering Hyrule Castle.

name: Loot
location: Boating Course (the record keeper) or Windfall Island (inside the Cafe Bar).

name: Fairy
location: Various locations (found in pots, dropped by enemies, or in Fairy Fountains).

name: Link & King of Red Lions
location: Reward for completing the entire Nintendo Gallery (collecting all other 133 figurines).

name: Knuckle
location: Tingle Island (HD Remaster only, found by drawing a specific chart) or Outset Island (GCN, found in a grotto by following Tingle's instructions). **Missable!** Can be difficult to find or unlock.
